name: Farkle Variations
description:
Farkle Variations is the classic folk dice game designed for fast and responsive game play. Pass and play with your favorite rules against friends or family, play against the computer, or play a solitaire game.

Farkle Variations has three different types of games (multiplayer, solitaire, and 10k solitaire), and over a thousand combinations of scoring options so you can choose your favorite rules.

Multiplayer games can have up to 8 players on iPad and up to 4 players on iPhone/iPod Touch.
